Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Marcoola Motel in Marcoola, you'll be near the airport and close to Twin Waters Golf Club and Mt Coolum Golf Club. This motel is within the vicinity of Sunshine Plaza and Coolum Beach.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 10 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and LCD televisions. Your room comes with a pillowtop bed. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and digital programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy recreation amenities such as an outdoor pool or take in the view from a garden. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access, tour/ticket assistance, and barbecue grills.

Dining
Cooked-to-order breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a computer station, luggage storage, and laundry facilities. A roundtrip airport shuttle is complimentary (available on request).


Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 10 AM
Cooked-to-order breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • Minimum Spring Break check-in age is 18 years old.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Twin Waters Golf Club - 3.1 km / 1.9 mi
Mt Coolum Golf Club - 4.2 km / 2.6 mi
Sunshine Plaza - 5.7 km / 3.5 mi
Coolum Beach - 8.2 km / 5.1 mi
Mooloolaba Beach - 9 km / 5.6 mi
Underwater World Sea Life - 9.2 km / 5.7 mi
Kawana Beach - 12 km / 7.4 mi
Big Pineapple - 13 km / 8.1 mi
Queensland Zoo - 13 km / 8.1 mi
Ginger Factory - 14.5 km / 9 mi
Aussie World - 17 km / 10.6 mi
Dickey Beach - 20.1 km / 12.5 mi
Eumundi Market - 20.2 km / 12.5 mi
Moffat Beach - 21.2 km / 13.2 mi
Shelly Beach - 22.3 km / 13.9 mi

The preferred airport for Marcoola Motel is Maroochydore, QLD (MCY-Sunshine Coast) - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • Minimum Spring Break check-in age is 18 years old.
